name: volume-parcel-smoothing
author: Washington University School of Medicin
description:
SMOOTH PARCELS IN A VOLUME SEPARATELY.

The volume is smoothed within each label in the label volume using data only from within the label.  Equivalent to running volume smoothing with ROIs matching each label separately, then adding the resulting volumes, but faster.

inputs.name: label_volume
inputs.description: a label volume containing the parcels to smooth

inputs.name: kernel
inputs.description: the size of the gaussian smoothing kernel in mm, as sigma by default

inputs.name: opt_fwhm
inputs.description: smoothing kernel size is FWHM, not sigma

inputs.name: opt_fix_zeros
inputs.description: treat zero values as not being data

inputs.name: opt_subvolume_subvol
inputs.description: select a single subvolume to smooth: the subvolume number or name
